content:
TITLE: Local Development Setup Commands
DESCRIPTION: Series of bench commands for setting up a local development environment including site creation and app installation
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bench start
bench new-site raven.test
bench --site raven.test add-to-hosts
bench get-app https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven
bench --site raven.test install-app raven
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Docker Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Downloads required Docker configuration files and initializes the development environment
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mkdir raven
cd raven

# Download the docker-compose file
wget -O docker-compose.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/develop/docker/docker-compose.yml

# Download the setup script
wget -O init.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/develop/docker/init.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Production Deployment Script
DESCRIPTION: Downloads the easy install script for deploying Raven in production
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
wget https://frappe.io/easy-install.py
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Production Deployment
DESCRIPTION: Executes the deployment script with configuration parameters for setting up Raven in production
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python3 ./easy-install.py deploy \
    --project=learning_prod_setup \
    --email=your_email.example.com \
    --image=ghcr.io/The-Commit-Company/raven \
    --version=stable \
    --app=raven \
    --sitename subdomain.domain.tld
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Developer Settings
DESCRIPTION: Commands to enable developer mode and disable CSRF for local development
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bench set-config -g developer_mode 1
bench --site raven.test set-config ignore_csrf 1
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Frontend Development Environment Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Example .env.local configuration for frontend development with Vite
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
VITE_BASE_NAME='' # This needs to be set as empty
VITE_SOCKET_PORT=9000 # This is the port on which socket.io is running. It's usually the main Frappe server port (8000) but in the 9000 series
VITE_SITE_NAME='raven.test' # This is the same of the site
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Dependencies for Raven
DESCRIPTION: Lists the required Python packages for the Raven project. The file notes that frappe is installed separately through the bench tool, while explicitly requiring the linkpreview and openai packages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/requirements.txt#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Plain Text
CODE:
```
# frappe -- https://github.com/frappe/frappe is installed via 'bench init'
linkpreview
openai
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Expo CLI for Raven Mobile App
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Expo Application Services (EAS) CLI globally using npm. This is a prerequisite for developing with the Raven mobile app.
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g eas-cli
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Raven Mobile App on iOS Simulator
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server and run the Raven mobile app on an iOS simulator using yarn.
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn run ios
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Raven Mobile App on Android Emulator
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server and run the Raven mobile app on an Android emulator using yarn.
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
yarn run android
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Post-Model Synchronization Migration Scripts
DESCRIPTION: A list of migration scripts to be executed after model synchronization. Each line represents a Python module path to a migration script with version indicators (v1_2, v1_3, v1_6, v2_0) showing the chronological order of migrations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/The-Commit-Company/raven/blob/develop/raven/patches.txt#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
raven.patches.v1_2.create_raven_users
raven.patches.v1_3.create_raven_message_indexes #23
raven.patches.v1_3.update_all_messages_to_include_message_content #2
raven.patches.v1_3.update_all_messages_to_include_replied_message_content #2
raven.patches.v1_6.create_raven_channel_member_index
raven.patches.v1_6.migrate_older_raven_users #2
raven.patches.v2_0.migrate_existing_dm_threads
raven.patches.v2_0.create_default_workspace
raven.patches.v2_0.create_default_company_workspace_mapping
```
